column3: “Sweet Dreams is a better night-time smoke than even some pure indicas, but don't let that put you off enjoying this gentle hybrid in the early evening. To me, Sweet Dreams has a really unique feel, and is perfect for anxiety alleviation or just relaxing during the day. It's not an intense relaxation- it doesn't give your sense of self an experiential Turkish bath like some strains do. It's mellow, floaty, and gentle-...”
“It was a really heavy indica,you just wanna chill on the couch and watch some toons with a bag of doritos or cheetos”

“I dunno, I like a little more truth in advertising. For me this is not the gentle, sleepy experience discussed in other reviews and the strain description. It is much closer to being hit in the forehead with a sledgehammer. A couple of hits of this and you pretty much get slammed into the couch almost senseless for a couple of hours. You are very high, but not very aware.”
“one of my favorites medically"
column4: relieves my anxiety so well and helps to put me in a gooood sleep! strong "kush-skunky" smell and aromas

column3: “Smoking this strain from Los Angeles CA, The name says it all, Sweet Dreams, has an amazing sweet smell, and gives you a good head high, lazy free! goes good with a sunny weather. Almost 4/20!”

“I didn't experience this to be a heavy indica as some other reviews have mentioned. This strain did relax me but did not make me sleepy. Things felt a little hazey but I was still pretty alert. I actually experienced some difficulty sleeping that evening. Not a good strain before bed, more of an after-work kind of strain.”

“Smoked this in Amsterdam, and man, it's true, you think you are just a high tolerate smoker and you will only get a little effect, then BAM, it hits you, although I did not get sleepy, just relaxed. I actually really enjoyed the come down effect more than ever, really at peace with earth.”
“clean smoke, great taste.”
“clean smoke, great taste.”
“Excelent and clean high, very nice aroma.”
“awesome flavors”
“amazing strain ! overall , makes you very calm , & sleepy . make sure to get food too haha . man i love food .'”
“This helps with to alleviate pain from osteoarthritis in my lower back. After vaping with sweet dreams I can sleep pain-free. It is a nice smooth feel and taste.”

“So I tried Sweet dreams for the first time about a week ago, and I right away fell in love. This is a hybrid Indica dominate strain, right away once you opened the container you right away smell this skunky, Kush like ammonia smell. The buds we perfectly trimmed and very green, it smokes real smooth, and it has a musty-earth flavor to it which to me taste perfectly. It does have a tendency to creep up on you though, ...”
“Hands down the best strain I've ever had! VERY strong and relaxing! Not a strong scent, but the smoke is smooth. Bud is dense and the flower is gorgeous. It's the definition of couch lock!”

“i had two experiences with this, one great, one awful. the first time was awesome. i was a little sluggish and was definetly a poor choice of strain for going hiking, but i was relaxed and happy. the second time i smoked more and i had a hard time with depth perception, walking, and communicating as if i was sober. i had to stay in bed the rest of the night because i felt so incapable moving. good in moderation, but ...”
“awesome flavors”
“amazing strain ! overall , makes you very calm , & sleepy . make sure to get food too haha . man i love food .'”

“Hits light comes on quick intense wobbles semi clearheaded functional well balanced functionality but jittery hands
Good for light night chill talk and sleep”
“I love this in the flower and oil. Great taste and perfect, balanced high. Good for pain for me personally. Highly recommended.”

“I really enjoyed this strain.  I only rated this strain as a 3, because i was able to feel the high quickly after I had lit up and inhailed a few puffs, but it was a gentle high.  I picked up reading my book have a little faith- Mitch albom" and my lady read an article to me about Borderline Personality Disorder (BPD) something she suffers with
column4: but than a second wave came into play when I was about to take a shower...”"

column3: “Exactly as stated. Not quite a 4, yet better than a 3.5. Nice.”

“let's get one thing straight. the only reason I'm giving it three stars is because of how sleepy it made me ! I'm normally not too fond of indica type strains as much as I am w/ sativa ! I like being giggly :-D although, the smell is very appealing ! I'd definitely recommend it to anyone who's just trying to catch some z's asap lol.”
“not bad they had mine marked as reserve but it wasent that potent imo still good bud tho a little expensive at 20 a g :(”

“This strain will make you relaxed and comfortable. Perfect for relieving stress or after a day of smoking sativa to wind down. It made me feel cuddly which is rare for me so my girlfriend appreciated that.”
“Sweet dreams is a wonderful tasting strain- almost a creamy hoppy flavor. I enjoyed it- didn't find its properties to be too suited for patients with high pain. It was however still a tasty smoke.”
“Great strain to make you sleepy if guys love the sleepy buds mhmm real dense”
“Better than the Manson song when it comes to knocking your butt out and sleeping without worries. Fruity and earthy but indica dominant for sure. Great bud! And not for amateurs”

“This was marked as a seasonal (late fall) strain here in Chicago. It did not, however, give me sweet dreams. I felt like some naive high school kid that got sold oregano; this stuff didn’t get me high at all.”

“Smooth ! From Gold leaf. Very rare I find a strain that I put my guard sown and just start running at the mouth , but ole sweety got me . Creeps into a nice body buzz . If you see this give it a chance a very nice flower !”
“Not as sedative as other strains I've had but in heavy amoutnts it can lay you down nice and slow.”
“Super sick strain for night time! It's a smooth hit and knocks my ass out!”
“Was super relaxed and felt great before passing out lol.  great if you need a good night sleep”
“Very relaxed , not as sleepy as expected. Perfect for movies or video games”
“love it!!!”

“This 1000 mL oil tank from PTS, is the only current indica offering in the 1000 mL tank product line. The flavor is very heavy pine with a myr/sage finish. The terpenes are very strong and the flavor was off-putting for me. The first few puffs felt like pine cleaning fluid. The effect was moderate relaxation, pain relief, and clearing of invasive thoughts. This was also the only tank from PTS that I tried which clogg...”
“PS. Stay home with this strain, you will have zero focus on anything. I almost got in a car accident because I was zoning off ! s/o to my bf for keeping me alert ! Happy smokin' (:”
